title: Need help to match fonts
content:
Hi,

Could anyone tell me their point of view on mathing Giza Seven Nine (Heading) and ITC Typewriter Light (body copy), please.

I also need a goog match for Griffith Gothic Light (body copy) to go as Heading.

Thanks in advance for any help.
author: Alienontherun

comments.content:
It all really depends on your design. Does it look good? If so, then yes, you can pair them together. If it doesn't look good, try something else.

- Lex
